title: Women's Opinions about their Doctors
question_text: A polling organization randomly sampled $1{,}287\text{ female U.S. residents}$ between the ages of 40 and 60 to ask them if they agreed with the statement, "My doctor does a good job of listening to my concerns." The population of interest for this study was all American

choices.text: Citizens between the ages of 40 and 60.
Women between the ages of 40 and 60.
Doctors who treat women between the ages of 40 and 60.
